{{flavour|A small, heavy projectile shaped specifically for use with slings. It is more effective as ammunition than simple stones.

----

"For when things are once come to the execution, there is no secrecy comparable to celerity; like the motion of a bullet in the air, which flieth so swift as it outruns the eye."

-Francis Bacon, _Essays_, "Of Delays". 1625.}}

[[Sling bullet]]s are one of the two kinds of [[missile]]s fired from a [[hunting sling]] or [[fustibalus]] using the [[Slings]] skill (the other being [[stone]]s). They deal more damage than stones, but cannot simply be thrown.

{| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center"

|-

==History==
*Sling bullets were removed with all launcher ammo in [[0.29]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], sling bullets could generate with a variety of [[brand]]s.
*In [[0.15]], [[sling (item)|slings]] were renamed to [[hunting sling]]s and [[greatsling]]s were added as a new weapon.
